mapper.select: SELECT f.film_id filmId, f.release_year releaseYear, f.rental_duration rentalDuration, f.special_features specialFeatures, f.replacement_cost replacementCost, n.title title, n.description description, n.category category, n.price price, n.length length, n.rating rating, n.actors actors, l.name languageName FROM film f LEFT JOIN nicer_but_slower_film_list n ON f.film_id=n.FID LEFT JOIN language l ON f.language_id=l.language_id WHERE f.film_id = #{filmId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nicer_but_slower_film_list
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titleAndDescription},'%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titleAndDescription},'%'))
AND description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchDescription},'%')
AND actors LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchActor},'%')
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND category = #{category}
AND rating IN('G','PG', 'PG-13')
AND rating IN('NC-17','R')
AND price = #{price}
